data.title: RIOLA PRAYER TIMES: مواقيت الصلاة
data.meta_description: Riola Prayer Times - Today Riola prayer timings are Fajr Time 4:18 AM, Dhuhr Time 1:21 PM, Asr Time 5:17 PM, Maghrib Time 8:28 PM and Isha Time 10:15 PM. Get monthly Riola salah timings and 7 days accurate Riola prayer time table.
data.text:
Today Prayer Times Riola, Italy

Today 10 Aug, 2024, Riola Namaz Timings are Fajr 4:18 AM, Dhuhr 1:21 PM, Asr 5:17 PM, Maghrib 8:28 PM & Isha 10:15 PM.

The city azan, salat schedule & 7 days time table is also provided. Daily Fajar (Fajr) timing in Riola, Dhuhur time, Asr time in Riola, Maghrib Riola prayer times & Isha Riola Namaz timing are available. Today's 06 Safar 1446 Riola namaz timing with next 7 days Schedule from 10 Aug, 2024 to 16 Aug, 2024 with customizable prayer time calculation methods to calculate the proper time for your prayer. On other hand, you may also read Riola zawal time updates with complete start and end time details.

Today Riola Sun Set time or Iftar Time in Riola is 6:14 AM and Dawn break Time or the end of Sehri Time in Riola is 4:18 AM. Along with Riola Prayers times you can also read the Riola Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Hanafi (sunni) or Riola Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Jafria (shia).

Prayer Timing Customization

By using this option you can change or adjust timing according to your country's prayer calculation methods. These timings are available for all Sunni schools of thought including Hanafi, Shafi, Maliki, and Hanbali.

You may also find here makrooh time updates including Riola zawal time with complete details start and end time.

Riola Sun Set time that is also called Iftar Time in Riola is 8:29 PM and Dawn break Time that is also end of Sehri Time in Riola at 4:17 AM. Sehri and Iftar time is also called Ramadan Time during the month of Ramadan.

Riola Prayer Times Today

Prayer Time in Riola for Saturday 10 Aug 2024 are:

Fajr Time in Riola: 4:18 AM

Zuhr Time in Riola: 1:21 PM

Asr Time in Riola: 5:17 PM

Maghrib Time in Riola: 8:28 PM

Isha Time in Riola: 10:15 PM

Q: What is Fajr time in Riola?

A: Fajr start time in Riola is at 4:18 AM and end time is 6:14 AM. Fajr consists of 4 Rakats as 2 Farz and 2 Sunnah.

Q: What time is Ishraq in Riola?

A: Ishraq Namaz Timing in Riola today starts at 06:29 AM and the end time is 09:47 AM.

Q: What is Zuhr Time in Riola?

A: Zuhr starting time in Riola is at 1:21 PM and the ending time is 5:17 PM. Zuhr Salah consists of 12 Rakat, including 4 Sunnah, 4 Farz, 2 Sunnah, and 2 nafl.

Q: What is Asr time in Riola?

A: Today Asr prayer start time in Riola is 5:17 PM, and it ends at 8:28 PM. It's an afternoon prayer consisting of 8 Rakat: 4 Sunnat and 4 Farz.

Q: What time is Maghrib in Riola?

A: Maghrib start time in Riola is at 8:28 PM, and the maghrib time end is 10:15 PM. It's a sunset prayer consisting of 7 Rakat: 3 Farz, 2 Sunnat, and 2 Nafl.

Q: What is Isha Time in Riola?

A: Today Isha Namaz time Riola starts at 10:15 PM and ends time at 4:18 AM. It's a night prayer consisting of 17 Rakat: 4 Sunnah, 4 Fard, 2 Sunnah, 2 Nafl, 3 Witr, and 2 Nafl.
